Description: St Mary of Egypt looking up, sitting on a rock, with her hands joined in a prayer. 1797 Etching and engraving
Producer name: Print made by: Jean Antoine Pierron
Curator's comments: Also see 1849,1208.39. Ribera's painting is in the Prado. We are grateful to Guido Huster for pointing out the mistakes in Le Blanc's cataloguing of this print.
Bibliographic references: Le Blanc 1854-89 / Manuel de l'Amateur d'Estampes 1550-1820 (2)
Associated names: Representation of: St Mary of Egypt
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: José de Salamanca y Mayol, Marquis of Salamanca (sale Sotheby's 24-7.ii.1869)
